Message.Title: Blowout Earnings Next Week : heading to $50/share by EOY.
Message.Msg: Coca-Cola with report blowout Earnings+ and possibly increase EPS for next quarter.... Easy $44+ (breaks 52 week high) on its uptrend to $50 by the end of the year. Maybe a Surprise ; that Warren has increased his Stake in the most Recognizable Brand in the world. Will be ironic if there is a 10% Price-up GAP ; the day they announce next week !!!!
